subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage-based caps, e.g., up to 80 messages every 3 hours on GPT-4o.
Usage-based caps, with a higher limit than the free tier (e.g., ~5x more usage).
Included as part of Google One AI Premium plan, no explicit token limits for users.

subscription_alternative.description: Open-source models. No direct subscription from Meta. Pricing is determined by third-party hosting platforms (e.g., Replicate, AWS Bedrock, Hugging Face) based on compute costs, not tokens.

subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage-based, integrated into Microsoft 365 apps for enterprise; separate access tiers for individuals.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing. The $20/month price point set by OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google is becoming the standard for consumer access to top-tier models, driving mass adoption.
pricing_analysis.trend: A dual trend is emerging: a 'race to the bottom' for pay-per-token API prices, driven by highly efficient models like DeepSeek and open-source alternatives, and a 'consolidation at the top' where leading providers standardize premium model access under a single $20/month subscription.
